title: leaverbuster
body: Riot i said some stuff I know i should not have I really wish that you would reduce my time I really am a good lol player in terms of sportsman ship, but i was playing some ranked and i got alittle carried away. so please reduce my time i really want to make this right please respond.

replies.body: We can't lift bans like this from accounts from here in H&S, but if you want you can reach out to the player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to talk about what happened and potential possibilities.
